title: Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager JobManagmentService Improper Access Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Veeam Backup Enterprise Manager. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the JobManagmentService component. The issue results from improper access control. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Veeam has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.veeam.com/kb4743
timeline:
2025-03-10 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-07-21 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-07-21 - Advisory Updated
credit: Nikolai Skliarenko of Trend Micro Security Research
